description: The Backend Core acts as the central entry point and orchestrator for the DocsGPT application, handling request routing, core application logic, authentication, and configuration.

components.name: Application Orchestrator
components.description: The main Flask application instance, serving as the primary orchestrator and central entry point for all incoming HTTP requests. It initializes the application and registers all API routes.

components.name: API Answer Routes
components.description: Defines and handles API endpoints specifically for processing user queries and initiating the AI-powered answer generation process, delegating to the RAG services.

components.name: API User Routes
components.description: Defines and handles API endpoints for user-specific functionalities, including document management, API key operations, and usage tracking.

components.name: Authentication & Authorization
components.description: Manages user authentication and authorization, ensuring secure access to application functionalities and data.

components.name: Configuration Manager
components.description: Centralized configuration management for application-wide parameters, environment variables, and secrets.
